broadcastOneOpt

public void broadcastOneOpt(Message theShip)
sends out the most costly customer in the route for the other carrier agents to bid upon
Parameters:
theShip - a message containing the shipment to broadcast. How to do this: Treat as a normal shipment Zues has a new Shipment linked list and ShipListAdaptor to contain the shipments that will be send out to bid.
